channel.title: How to get free dial-up internet
channel.description:
Hello, In this guide I will show you how to get free dial-up using AOL, Netzero and Juno. Method 1 Using AOL: Requirements: A person who already has AOL internet A computer And a time you can get on and they can get off. Step 1:Go to their house and get on Step 2:Go to settings Step 3:Click on screennames Step 4:Create a new ADULT screen name! The adult is important unless you want them to get e-mail's on what your doing Step 5:Get a free Aol CD and insert it into the computer that you want free internet Step 6:Start the install Step 7: When it comes to are you new or existing click existing and enter any information it needs Step 8: Click your screenname and enter your password Step 9: If you don't see your name click guest and enter your info WARNING: DO NOT SIGN UP FOR A NEW TRIAL OR ACCOUNT JUST A SCREEN NAME!!! Welcome to AOL! Note: If it says you cant logon because your already on, get the person to get off.
Method 2 Using Netzero: Step1:Go here http://www.netzero.net/support/start/new-account.html and folow the steps
Method 3: Using Juno Step 1: go to http://www.juno.com/support/start/new-account.html and sign up for free
Note: Juno and Netzero have 10 hrs free AOL is unlimited Note: Download the software for Methods 2 & 3 at juno.com and netzero.com respectively

item.title: How to get free dial-up internet
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

[quote=“llib, post:17, topic:149580”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=204965.msg1837783#msg1837783 date=1193018869]
Why would you want dial-up?
[/quote]

Not that I want dial-up its more like I have to have it. When you live out away from the big cities like some, charter/dsl/everything else I’ve tried…just doesn’t reach us sniff Theres Hughes sure buts thats 60$ a month for the cheapest plan plus the nice 180$ installation fee…and I don’t want it that bad. :rolleyes:[/quote]
same for Wyoming…

Read full topic
item.source: How to get free dial-up internet

item.title: How to get free dial-up internet
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

Hello, In this guide I will show you how to get free dial-up using AOL, Netzero and Juno.
Method 1 Using AOL:
Requirements:
A person who already has AOL internet
A computer
And a time you can get on and they can get off.
Step 1:Go to their house and get on
Step 2:Go to settings
Step 3:Click on screennames
Step 4:Create a new ADULT screen name!
The adult is important unless you want them to get e-mail’s on what your doing
Step 5:Get a free Aol CD and insert it into the computer that you want free internet
Step 6:Start the install
Step 7: When it comes to are you new or existing click existing and enter any information it needs
Step 8: Click your screenname and enter your password
Step 9: If you don’t see your name click guest and enter your info
WARNING: DO NOT SIGN UP FOR A NEW TRIAL OR ACCOUNT JUST A SCREEN NAME!!!
Welcome to AOL!
Note: If it says you cant logon because your already on, get the person to get off.

Method 2 Using Netzero:
Step1:Go here http://www.netzero.net/support/start/new-account.html and folow the steps

Method 3: Using Juno
Step 1: go to http://www.juno.com/support/start/new-account.html and sign up for free

Note: Juno and Netzero have 10 hrs free AOL is unlimited
Note: Download the software for Methods 2 & 3 at juno.com and netzero.com respectively

Read full topic
item.source: How to get free dial-up internet
